page.title: 11Upper Stoke Family Life
page.content: In Upper Stoke we spoke to a mother, married with 2 children under 4. She had no wish to live in a town such as Norwich.She likes living in this community and would not wish to it change.She shops in Poringland,and does not feel isolated living here,and does not attend the local Parish. She travels around by foot.She has no time for entertaiment.She said that there are enough surgeries.Her 2 daughters will attend local schools.She thinks there are enough activities for her children,but there should be more sports available.The family did not support any of they village teams.She did not want to see the village change and believed that a Marina Centre to be built in 1985 would be most welcome,this would make the village more developed.
